name: The Death Contract (Vinark117, Swatt Game)
description:
One day you were just walking around, when you fell into an endless pit and killed yorself. Luckily, Death was kind enough to grant you the ability to not die, in exchange of doing him a favour.

Controls
  • Move with WASD / Arrows / Left joystick (Gamepad)
  • Sprint with Shift / Right trigger (Gamepad)
  • Jump with W / Space / Up / A (Gamepad)
  • Attack with LMB / X (Gamepad)
  • Shoot spell with RMB / Y (Gamepad)
  • Reset with R
Credits
  • The game was made for the 3rd Wowie Jam
  • All assets were made during the 72 hour time period
  • The game was made by Vinark117 & Swattso
    • Animation - Swattso
    • Art - Swattso
    • Sound design - Swattso
    • Programming - Vinark
